nodes.text: Greeley was a man who served the Galactic Empire as an engineer during the time of the Galactic Civil War.

Greeley served aboard the Imperial prison barge Purge and was aboard it in 1 BBY when the barge broke down while en route to the detainment moon Gradient Seven. Greeley was selected to be part of a boarding party that was to travel from the Purge to a nearby abandoned Star Destroyer, to search for spare parts to try and repair the barge with. The team was led by Jareth Sartoris and it made it's way onto the Star Destroyer through a docking shaft. They then split into two and Sartoris, Blandings, the Imperial Corrections Officers Austin and Vesek, and the engineer Blandings made their way to the Star Destroyer's maintenance level, where they found some parts. They then made their way back to the Purge, but all of the party, apart from Sartoris, had contracted a virus while on the Star Destroyer and Greeley began to feel ill. He was admitted to the Purge's medical bay, where he died of the illness a short time later.
